code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer innerPrepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     String[] realms = request.paramAsStringArrayOrEmptyIfAll("realms").     String[] usernames = request.paramAsStringArrayOrEmptyIfAll("usernames").     ClearRealmCacheRequest req = new ClearRealmCacheRequest().realms(realms).usernames(usernames).     return channel -> new SecurityClient(client).clearRealmCache(req, new NodesResponseRestListener<>(channel)). }
